name: Bird Out
description:
Bird Out is a game inspired by "Ape Out" and "Enter The Gungeon" blending the mechanics of the two games together into a game where you escape a lab as a bird with "Enter The Gungeon" like mechanics and other influences from "Ape Out"

Controls:

    Hold (RB) and a direction key to dodge roll

    Hold Space to suck in enemies

   Use WASD to move

    Use Shift to dash

    Use (LB) to shoot out enemies that you eat

Credits:

     Music - @Theoprior

     Trees - @GraphScriptDev

      Art - @DerpiestDude

      Programming - @Max Campbell
